algorithm_technique: Frequency counting with normalization and combination formula
problem_summary_simple: Count pairs of dominoes that are identical or can be rotated to be identical.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a Counter to store normalized domino representations (min, max) and applies the combination formula n*(n-1)/2 for counts.
key_insights: Normalizing dominoes (e.g., by sorting the pair) simplifies equivalence checking.
A frequency map (Counter) efficiently stores counts of normalized dominoes.
The combination formula C(n, 2) = n*(n-1)/2 is used to count pairs from identical items.
